content: Note that we had several problems with the intermediate release candidates, and v4.20.0-rc5 is the preferred release candidate.

Due to some time restrictions this week (the Lean FRO has been at our annual retreat), some of the repositories upstream of Mathlib do not yet have tags for v4.20.0-rc5, and are still on an earlier release candidates (and similarly their most recent tag may be for an earlier release candidate). This shouldn't be a problem, as the release candidates should only differ in user interaction and/or linking behaviour. If I have time I'll try to bring everything uniformly to v4.20.0-rc5, but I'd also welcome help doing this in places where people see the need. Running script/release_checklist.py v4.20.0-rc5 in the lean4 repository may be helpful!
The release notes link points to the notes for rc3
(i.e. yes, and I'm not intending to update until we release the stable)
I opened the relevant doc-gen4 bump PRs so we can bump and tag FLT (FLT#476), but thereâ€™s no particular hurry.
